review: \"Dr. Abhshek is an exceptional cardiologist at intercontinental hospital He is highly skilled, knowledgeable, and compassionate. He takes the time to listen to patient concerns, thoroughly explains treatment plans, and provides excellent care. I highly recommend Dr. Abhshek for cardiology services.\

Me and my son had been to hospital and it was for heart related. ********* *** **** **** ** ******* ****** ** *** ** ********* ******* *********** I have already recommended the doctor to my family or friends. He gives nice consultation and gives time, understand and checks history. I had heart palpitation issues. Medicines was suggested for my son. Blood tests was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Angioplasty was done for me long back. Doctor was very friendly. If he gives online consultation too it would be useful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took my mother for severe chest pain. We are very much happy with the treatment or the way Abhishek Mohanthy checked and diagnosed. Very professional and sincere towards the job. The first doctor who gave importance to all the past records, went through them and later recommended for only required test. I will definitely say that "Doctors should be like him". Appreciate the way he understood the problem and explained us clearly on the causes of problem. Felt like he works for his patient satisfaction. Gave us faith that still there are wonderful and sincere doctors within our society.

My grand mother had visited the hospital and it was a cardiac problem. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Patient is satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Surgery was suggested for her. Doctor was friendly and Hospitality was good.

My dad had visited the hospital and it was heart related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.  Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 30 minutes. 2 years back he was hospitalized and Dr. Abhisekh treated. Post that we are going for follow-up checkup. My dad had cholesterol and walking, diet was suggested. Continuous monitoring of BP is done. Doctor is friendly.

My father and father in law had consulted the doctor as they had heart ailments, it was general heart checkup. ****** *** **** **** *** he was reachable, he gives time for consultation. We had a very good consultation experience. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Tablets were told to continue by the doctor. There was not much waiting time in the hospital when we went.

We happen to meet the doctor for 2nd opinion for my father heart. I am so happy with the doctor consultation, he listens to our problems end explains each and everything, my father had a blockage in heart so other doctor said he need to do bypass surgery but Dr Abhisekh said no need to do surgery it can be cured by medicines only, the registration process was to long in hospital rather than that i am very much satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Very nice of his explanation Friendly nature Ready to help &advice Offered to council even on phone

Experience was good with the doctor from past 2 years i am visiting him, he is very nice and humble doctor and also smiley person, first he went to our reports and then suggested some precautions, he also advised us how and what to do in future, he explains very neat and clear so that we can understand properly, i was convinced with the doctor treatment and i have advised many people to visit him
